sourcesContent:
import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import pokemonproject from '../Assets/pokemonproject.png' export default function PokemonDetails() { const location = useLocation() const number = location.state.number const source = `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI/sprites/master/sprites/pokemon/${number}.png` const [pokemon, setPokemon] = useState({}) console.log(number, ' number') useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/${number}/`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data, 'pokemon') setPokemon(data) document.getElementById('Sprite').src = source }) .catch((err) => { console.log('Error encountered') }) }, []) const toInitialMayusc = (str) => str.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + str.slice(1) return (

Type

Type: {}

Number: {number}

Name: {pokemon.name}

Height: {pokemon.height}

Weight: {pokemon.weight}

Stats:

{pokemon.stats[0].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[0].base_stat}

{pokemon.stats[1].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[1].base_stat}

{pokemon.stats[2].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[2].base_stat}

{pokemon.stats[3].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[3].base_stat}

{pokemon.stats[4].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[4].base_stat}

{pokemon.stats[5].stat.name}: {pokemon.stats[5].base_stat}

) }
